message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product, and I believe it's worth a significant investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $1100000 for it.
I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1150000.
I'm glad we're closing the gap. Considering the value and condition of the product, I think $1125000 would be a fair price for us both.

I'm getting closer to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go below $1200000. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to ensure I get a good return on my investment. I'll sell the product to you for $1175000.
Considering the market conditions and the product's value, I believe $1150000 would be a reasonable price for us both.
I'm willing to meet you at $1150000, but I need to make a bit more to make it worth my while. I'll sell the product to you for $1165000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Considering the product's condition and the current market, I believe $1155000 would be a fair price.
I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to make a bit more to meet my minimum. I'll sell the product to you for $1160000.
I understand your position, and I believe we're very close. Considering the product's value and our previous negotiations, I propose a final offer of $1157500.
